localization

Conzept in German

Most of the Conzept interface can be localized, these parts include main UI elements such as menu labels and the topic-card section names. Conzept has basic support for right-to-left scripts such as Arabic.

The list of supported locales can be found in the Conzept settings file (look for the “CONZEPT_LOCALES” setting).

If you want to add a new locale to Conzept:

  1. Add the locale to the “CONZEPT_LOCALES” setting in the Conzept settings file.

  2. Add a the new locale file to the “app/explore2/assets/i18n” directory. The easiest way to do this is to copy the english locale to your new locale file and then make the translation changes needed for that locale.

  3. Finally run “npm run build” to rebuild Conzept.

Optional: It would be very nice to file an issue or pull-request on the GitHub repo for this new translation file!
